title: Active Devices
subtitle: Manage devices with access to your account

info.title: About Device Management
info.description: Revoking a device will immediately close all sessions on that device. The device will need to log in again to regain access. If you see an unfamiliar device, revoke it immediately and change your password.

confirmations.revokeCurrent: This is your CURRENT device. Revoking it will log you out immediately. Are you sure?
confirmations.revokeOther: Are you sure you want to revoke this device? All sessions on this device will be closed.

empty.title: No active devices found
empty.description: Devices will appear here after login

security.title: Security Tip
security.description: If you notice any suspicious activity or unfamiliar devices, revoke them immediately and consider changing your password. You can do this from your

errors.CSRF_VALIDATION_FAILED: CSRF validation failed. Please refresh the page.
